name: Pyvmomi
body:
### Welcome to pyVmomi.
If you're just getting started, you actually want to visit [pyvmomi-community-samples](http://vmware.github.io/pyvmomi-community-samples/) first. You only need to work with the pyVmomi source code directly if you are planning on contributing to the core library.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
